SELECT #{career.resumeNum}, (SELECT ci.COMPANY_CODE FROM companyinfo ci WHERE ci.COMPANY_NAME = #{career.companyName}), #{career.dname}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{career.joinDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{career.resignationDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'),
NULL,
#{career.jobDescription}, #{career.position}, #{career.sal} FROM DUAL
) A
